alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 5:17AM AKST until December 30 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snow accumulation will be along the Haines Highway near Haines Customs, with significantly lower amounts closer to sea level, including for the town of Haines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
